In this section, we'll ask you to:

  • confirm youÂ have signed the Local Digital Declaration and agree to follow the 5 principles
  • confirm your section 151 officer is aware of this funding and it is managed in line with your internal budget managing process
  • confirm you agree to let all outputs from this work be published under open licence with a view to any organisation accessing, using or adopting them freely
  • confirm the information you have provided is accurate
